alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 9:10PM CDT until June 15 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Southern Logan County in central Oklahoma... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 910 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Mulhall to 3 miles south of Cashion, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Guthrie, Langston, Crescent, Cashion, Coyle, Cedar Valley, Cimarron City, Meridian, Navina, and Seward. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
